```
zip: List<A>, List<B> -> List<(A, B)>
zip(Nil, Nil) = Nil
zip(_, Nil) = Nil
zip(Nil, _) = Nil
zip(Cons(a, as), Cons(b, bs)) = Cons((a, b), zip(as, bs))

fst: (A, B) -> A
fst((a, _)) = a

last: List<A> -> A
last(Cons(a, Nil)) = a
last(Cons(a, as)) = last(as)

foldl: (B, A -> B), B, List<A> -> B
foldl(_, z, Nil) = z
foldl(f, z, Cons(x, xs)) = foldl(f, f(z, x), xs)

```
